titles.title: Urban Agriculture Healthy Food and Entrepreneur Act
Urban Agriculture Healthy Food and Entrepreneur Act
To provide for the enhancement of urban agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development
